title: Leaver Buster due to Client error.
body: I have been having an issue with my client crashing after champ select and I have been placed in low priority queue due to me not being able to connect to the game. I repaired my client and updated my software but now I am stuck with the grueling wait to enter the game. Is there anyway I can have this taken off or removed. I did not intentionally leave the last three games. If it is out of reach to fix then I understand but if there is a way to remove it please someone let me know.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties cannot be removed. This is because regardless of the reason the disconnection happens, it negatively impacts everyone in the match. This is a key reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we don't modify penalties.

Let me know a bit more details regarding the crashing so we can work to resolve that together.
